Author: Dalos_
Text: Something what helps me not stress as much (I don’t binge but I do other things) is self care soaps- basically any product from Lush. I just take a shower instead of wallowing in what I have to do, enjoy my face masks and bubbles and jellies, and it washes the knots away. Plus it’s a nice, busy distraction away from whatever was in your focus. As a bonus, you’ve just practiced self love and self care AND you’re clean and smelling fresh. I’ve taken to even taking multiple showers a day because of it.

Author: katebishophawkguy
Text: What I’m trying to do is identify more of my triggers so I can deal with them early on and develop coping mechanisms so they don’t have the same effect on me. Meds can help if you have really extreme stress too.
